languages.text: "Н-ни в коем случае! Ризза... она изумовыжила просто, Ваша Светлость. Начала друзей опасных заводить, с какими-то мордами подозрительными д-дела иметь. Ее все отговаривали — одно дело побрякушки всякие еретические сбывать, а совсем другое на себе их носить. Но с ней же не поспоришь: "Старая Ризза то, старая Ризза се, жить не учите, а то кишки выпущу". С-сдурела, короче, совсем". {n}Пират в сердцах сплевывает и тут же пугается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Н-ни в коем случае! Ризза… она из ума выжила просто, Ваша Светлость. Начала друзей опасных заводить, с какими-то мордами страшенными, д-дела с ними иметь. Ее все отговаривали — одно дело побрякушки всякие еретические сбывать, а совсем другое на себе их носить. Но с ней же хрен поспоришь: "Старая Ризза то, старая Ризза се, жить не учите, а то кишки выпущу". С-сдурела, короче, совсем". {n}Пират в сердцах сплевывает.{/n}

languages.text: "P-perish the thought! Ryzza... just went completely insanitary, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Started making dangerous friends and getting into d-deals with some right dodgy-looking fellows. Everybody tried to talk her out of it. It's one thing to sell heretical trinkets and such. It's a whole 'nother thing to wear them. But there's no arguing with her, is there? It's all old Ryzza this, and old Ryzza that, and don't lecture me, or I'll gut you. Sh-she went bonkers, and that's the long and the short of it." {n}The pirate spits irately and is immediately frightened of what he just did.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Н-ни в коем случае! Ризза... она изумовыжила просто, Ваша Светлость. Начала друзей опасных заводить, с какими-то мордами подозрительными д-дела иметь. Ее все отговаривали — одно дело побрякушки всякие еретические сбывать, а совсем другое на себе их носить. Но с ней же не поспоришь: "Старая Ризза то, старая Ризза се, жить не учите, а то кишки выпущу". С-сдурела, короче, совсем". {n}Пират в сердцах сплевывает и тут же пугается.{/n}

languages.text: “请、请您千万别这么想！莱萨她……她彻底发了狂疯，大人。她结交起了危险的朋友，还开始和……和看起来很可疑的家伙做……做着生意。每个人都劝她别这么干，毕竟倒卖异端的小玩意儿是一回事儿，可如果把那些东西戴在身上，那就是另一回事儿了。但她根本就不听劝，是吧？不管我们说啥，她都一会儿这个，一会那个，总之就是不准我们继续念叨她，否则她就会活剥了我们。她……她就是发疯了，事情就是这么回事儿。”{n}这个海盗恼怒地吐了口唾沫，随后立刻被自己刚刚的行为吓得惶恐不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: "P-perish the thought! Ryzza... just went completely insanitary, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Started making dangerous friends and getting into d-deals with some right dodgy-looking fellows. Everybody tried to talk her out of it. It's one thing to sell heretical trinkets and such. It's a whole 'nother thing to wear them. But there's no arguing with her, is there? It's all old Ryzza this, and old Ryzza that, and don't lecture me, or I'll gut you. Sh-she went bonkers, and that's the long and the short of it." {n}The pirate spits irately and is immediately frightened of what he just did.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请、请您千万别这么想！莱萨她……她彻底发了狂疯，大人。她结交起了危险的朋友，还开始和……和看起来很可疑的家伙做……做着生意。每个人都劝她别这么干，毕竟倒卖异端的小玩意儿是一回事儿，可如果把那些东西戴在身上，那就是另一回事儿了。但她根本就不听劝，是吧？不管我们说啥，她都一会儿这个，一会那个，总之就是不准我们继续念叨她，否则她就会活剥了我们。她……她就是发疯了，事情就是这么回事儿。”{n}这个海盗恼怒地吐了口唾沫，随后立刻被自己刚刚的行为吓得惶恐不已。{/n}

languages.text: 「な、なんてことを！リザは…完全に気が狂ってしまったんです、陛下。危険な友人を作り始め、怪しい奴らと、と、取引を始めてしまいました。皆、彼女にやめさせようと、説得を試みました。異端の装身具などを売るのと、それを身につけるのはまったく別ものです。でも、彼女と言い争うなんてできないでしょう？リザ婆さんはああだこうだとうるさく言って、物事を教えようなどとするなら内臓を取り出すぞ！とか言ってきて…か、完全に気が狂ってるんです…そ、それで全部です」{n}海賊は唾を吐き捨てるが、直後、自身がしたことに怯えを見せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "P-perish the thought! Ryzza... just went completely insanitary, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Started making dangerous friends and getting into d-deals with some right dodgy-looking fellows. Everybody tried to talk her out of it. It's one thing to sell heretical trinkets and such. It's a whole 'nother thing to wear them. But there's no arguing with her, is there? It's all old Ryzza this, and old Ryzza that, and don't lecture me, or I'll gut you. Sh-she went bonkers, and that's the long and the short of it." {n}The pirate spits irately and is immediately frightened of what he just did.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「な、なんてことを！リザは…完全に気が狂ってしまったんです、陛下。危険な友人を作り始め、怪しい奴らと、と、取引を始めてしまいました。皆、彼女にやめさせようと、説得を試みました。異端の装身具などを売るのと、それを身につけるのはまったく別ものです。でも、彼女と言い争うなんてできないでしょう？リザ婆さんはああだこうだとうるさく言って、物事を教えようなどとするなら内臓を取り出すぞ！とか言ってきて…か、完全に気が狂ってるんです…そ、それで全部です」{n}海賊は唾を吐き捨てるが、直後、自身がしたことに怯えを見せた。{/n}

languages.text: «¡D-deshágase de esa idea! Ryzza... se volvió completamente majareta, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Empezó a tener amistades peligrosas y meterse en tratos con tipos chungos. Todos trataron de disuadirla. Una cosa es vender baratijas heréticas y cosas así y otra muy distinta es llevarlas. Pero no se puede discutir con ella, ¿verdad que no? Siempre que si la vieja Ryzza esto, que si la vieja Ryzza lo otro, no me sermonees o te destriparé. S-se convirtió en una pirada, eso es todo». {n}El pirata escupe indignado y se asusta inmediatamente de lo que acaba de hacer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "P-perish the thought! Ryzza... just went completely insanitary, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Started making dangerous friends and getting into d-deals with some right dodgy-looking fellows. Everybody tried to talk her out of it. It's one thing to sell heretical trinkets and such. It's a whole 'nother thing to wear them. But there's no arguing with her, is there? It's all old Ryzza this, and old Ryzza that, and don't lecture me, or I'll gut you. Sh-she went bonkers, and that's the long and the short of it." {n}The pirate spits irately and is immediately frightened of what he just did.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡D-deshágase de esa idea! Ryzza... se volvió completamente majareta, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Empezó a tener amistades peligrosas y meterse en tratos con tipos chungos. Todos trataron de disuadirla. Una cosa es vender baratijas heréticas y cosas así y otra muy distinta es llevarlas. Pero no se puede discutir con ella, ¿verdad que no? Siempre que si la vieja Ryzza esto, que si la vieja Ryzza lo otro, no me sermonees o te destriparé. S-se convirtió en una pirada, eso es todo». {n}El pirata escupe indignado y se asusta inmediatamente de lo que acaba de hacer.{/n}

languages.text: "Bewahre! Ryzza ... ist einfach völlig geisterkrank geworden, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Hat sich mit gefährlichen Leuten angefreundet und angefangen, D-Deals mit zwerglichtigen Typen zu machen. Alle haben versucht, es ihr auszureden. Es ist eine Sache, ketzerischen Klump zu verkaufen. Aber eine ganz andere, das Zeug selber zu tragen. Aber mit ihr lässt sich ja nicht reden, oder? Immer heißt's nur 'die alte Ryzza hier' und 'die alte Ryzza da' und 'spart Euch Eure Ratschläge oder ich steche Euch ab'. S-Sie ist verrückt geworden, so einfach ist das." {n}Der Pirat spuckt zornig aus und erschrickt augenblicklich davor, was er da gerade getan hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "P-perish the thought! Ryzza... just went completely insanitary, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Started making dangerous friends and getting into d-deals with some right dodgy-looking fellows. Everybody tried to talk her out of it. It's one thing to sell heretical trinkets and such. It's a whole 'nother thing to wear them. But there's no arguing with her, is there? It's all old Ryzza this, and old Ryzza that, and don't lecture me, or I'll gut you. Sh-she went bonkers, and that's the long and the short of it." {n}The pirate spits irately and is immediately frightened of what he just did.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bewahre! Ryzza ... ist einfach völlig geisterkrank geworden, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Hat sich mit gefährlichen Leuten angefreundet und angefangen, D-Deals mit zwerglichtigen Typen zu machen. Alle haben versucht, es ihr auszureden. Es ist eine Sache, ketzerischen Klump zu verkaufen. Aber eine ganz andere, das Zeug selber zu tragen. Aber mit ihr lässt sich ja nicht reden, oder? Immer heißt's nur 'die alte Ryzza hier' und 'die alte Ryzza da' und 'spart Euch Eure Ratschläge oder ich steche Euch ab'. S-Sie ist verrückt geworden, so einfach ist das." {n}Der Pirat spuckt zornig aus und erschrickt augenblicklich davor, was er da gerade getan hat.{/n}

languages.text: « C-certainement pas ! Ryzza... Elle avait complètement sombré dans l'insanitation, Votre Seigneurie. Elle s'était fait des amis dangereux et elle passait des marchés avec des individus sacrément louches. On a tous essayé de la faire changer d'avis, parce que vendre des babioles hérétiques, c'est une chose, mais les porter, c'est pas le même délire. Mais elle écoutait pas. Elle faisait que répondre : "ouais, mais c'est moi qui décide, et me fais pas la leçon sinon je t'étripe", vous voyez le genre. Au final, elle est d-devenue complètement dingo. » {n}Probablement par habitude, le pirate crache au sol avec un air de dégoût, puis il se fige, comme s'il redoutait votre réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "P-perish the thought! Ryzza... just went completely insanitary, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Started making dangerous friends and getting into d-deals with some right dodgy-looking fellows. Everybody tried to talk her out of it. It's one thing to sell heretical trinkets and such. It's a whole 'nother thing to wear them. But there's no arguing with her, is there? It's all old Ryzza this, and old Ryzza that, and don't lecture me, or I'll gut you. Sh-she went bonkers, and that's the long and the short of it." {n}The pirate spits irately and is immediately frightened of what he just did.{/n}

Elle s'était fait des amis dangereux et elle passait des marchés avec des individus sacrément louches. On a tous essayé de la faire changer d'avis, parce que vendre des babioles hérétiques, c'est une chose, mais les porter, c'est pas le même délire. Mais elle écoutait pas. Elle faisait que répondre : "ouais, mais c'est moi qui décide, et me fais pas la leçon sinon je t'étripe", vous voyez le genre. Au final, elle est d-devenue complètement dingo. » {n}Probablement par habitude, le pirate crache au sol avec un air de dégoût, puis il se fige, comme s'il redoutait votre réaction.{/n}

languages.text: "T... Tövbe deyin! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Ryzza... hepten çırdıldı işte. Tehlikeli dostlar edinip n... Ne idiği belirsiz şahıslarla iş tutmaya başladı. İkaz da ettik, herkes etti. Kâfir süsleri satmak başka iş, o süsleri takınmak bambaşka. Ama hiç söz dinler mi? Koca Ryzza öyle yapar, Koca Ryzza böyle yapar, öğüt vereni deşer. K... Kafayı yedi işte, uzun lafın kısası." {n}Korsan, öfkeyle tükürüp ne yaptığını fark edince anında dehşete düşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "P-perish the thought! Ryzza... just went completely insanitary, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Started making dangerous friends and getting into d-deals with some right dodgy-looking fellows. Everybody tried to talk her out of it. It's one thing to sell heretical trinkets and such. It's a whole 'nother thing to wear them. But there's no arguing with her, is there? It's all old Ryzza this, and old Ryzza that, and don't lecture me, or I'll gut you. Sh-she went bonkers, and that's the long and the short of it." {n}The pirate spits irately and is immediately frightened of what he just did.{/n}
